title: Taking the Heat
description: Things are heating up at Bailey’s Pub... Working as the cook at his family’s pub, Liam O’Neil has nothing but respect for his firefighter regulars. But when firefighter Sophie Tyler takes a part-time job at the pub, Liam must be cautious. A widower with two young sons, he can’t put his heart on the line for someone who walks into burning buildings. But how can he ignore the fire burning within?
author: Kathryn Shay
